channel.title: cartography on Rachel Manderfeld, Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in cartography on Rachel Manderfeld, Portfolio

item.title: Lake Explorer for Peterborough and the Kawarthas
item.description: Scope of project is lakes in Peterborough and the Kawarthas. Designed for general and citizen-scientist users. Made as part of collaborative final project for GIS program at Fleming College in partnership with Kawartha Conservation. Teammates include L. Greidanus and K. Jones-McGowan. View Lake Explorer Images from website:

item.title: Chiniguchi Waterways Provincial Park Canoe Route Map
item.description: Map created using Ontario datasets in ArcGIS Pro and Mapublisher for AI.

item.title: Enhanced Flow Direction Grid
item.description: Cartographic depiction and analysis created using Ontario datasets in ArcGIS Pro with ArcHydro extension.
